pageContext.claim: “Last month, we saw large declines in the unemployment rate for African Americans, Hispanic Americans, and Asian Americans -- very big declines. We're witnessing the fastest labor market recovery from any economic crisis in history, by far.”
pageContext.analysis: Covid-19 cases did decline over the course of the month of August, but Trump’s cherry-picking of numbers covers the fact that the U.S. continues to have more cases than anywhere else in the world.
